name: Soul's Fold: Origin
description:
A Tower Defense game set in a world where magic was lost millennia ago, in the weeks after magic was lost. However I have not implemented the story or the final Art Assets yet so this is just the gameplay.

This is the first game I would have finished as of... ever. 

If anyone has any constructive feedback I would love to hear it.

Also if anyone was wondering about the name, it is because I have a story written out for a game I call Souls Fold and this takes place at the earliest event in that timeline.

I did not include a tutorial to this game so this will have some information to help get into the game  

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Zzm_HxHrZeVcSx2KtylReG_nYL7a6uygPTnWKqatJdU/...

And Finally I know the art is crap, I'm a solo programmer and made all the art in 2 hours. I could do better with more time dedicated to it.
